Contact Us
Physical Address:
Email:
For general questions
6470 SW 80th Avenue
ottersprings@forvets.us
Trenton, FL 32693
352.463.0800
352.463.0575 FAX
Driving Directions
From I-75 take Exit 387. Take ramp toward W Newberry Road (SR 26); go 0.2 mile. Turn west toward Newberry on W Newberry Road (SR 26); go approximately 30 miles. Exit soft right just past Wilcox & Otter Springs signs; go 0.2 mi. Turn right on CR 232; go 1.6 miles. Turn left on SW 70th Street; go 1.0 mile. Turn right into entrance at 6470 SW 80th Ave.
From Highway 19 (US ALT 27) in Fanning Springs, bear left on SR 26 going south or right going north; go 1.4 miles. Turn left on CR 232 (on curve, just past Otter Springs sign); go 1.7 miles. Turn left on SW 70th Street; go 1.0 mile. Turn right into entrance at 6470 SW 80th Avenue.

Forvets, Inc. Veterans Recreation & Wellness Program – Agenda
Sign up for that special program that you would like to participate in.   On the 2nd Saturday of each month from 10AM to 4PM Veterans and their family can come and enjoy the recreation the park has;   Pavilion 1 is for spending time at the spring.  ...
.et_pb_post
Forvets, inc. Recreation & Wellness Program
The goal of this program for our Veterans and their families is recreation for the mind, body and soul.   A Place for Retreat and Renewal on Florida's Nature Coast Experience 636 acres of natural Florida at Otter Springs Park & Campground.   This day is...

Forvets, Inc. Veterans Recreation & Wellness Program Sign up to volunteer
Sign up to volunteer your special skill that you would like to offer to a Veteran. This is the 2nd Saturday of each month, from the hours of 10am to 4pm. You can choose varied hours in this time frame or all day. “For example, Fred's skill is Wood engraving and can...
